title: Azure Administrator Mastery (AZ-104)
subtitle: Master Advanced Azure Administration
description: Master advanced Azure administration with comprehensive resource management skills
overview: This intensive 4-day course covers advanced Azure administration concepts and prepares you for the AZ-104 certification. Learn to manage complex Azure environments, implement governance frameworks, and master resource management at scale.

personalStory.story: Managing Azure at enterprise scale requires more than just technical knowledge—it requires battle-tested strategies. I've managed Azure environments for organizations with thousands of users, and I've learned what works and what doesn't. In this training, I share the real-world administrative patterns that have saved countless hours and prevented critical issues.
